item.description:
Horizon Edge Casino Cruise is Boston's ONLY Las Vegas Style Casino!
www.horizonsedge.com

Are Thinking about joining us???? Hesitant but always wanted to go on this cruise???
Never went because you didn't want to go solo?
Then, join us! The last cruise was great... This one will be even better!

NOTE: Check website for coupons. Look in The Boston Globe and other area newpapers for money saving coupons.


SATURDAY, AUGUST 30TH ENTERTAINMENT: WODS- OLDIES 103 with JJ Wright
LOTS OF DANCING!!!!

LAS VEGAS STYLE ACTION!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
FEATURED ARE: Over 225 slots with over 90% payouts
Black Jack, Roulette, Let-it-Ride,
3 Card Poker, Craps
SAT NIGHT: The ever popular TEXAS HOLD'EM

TIME: Arrive @ least 30 minutes before boarding
Board @ 6pm
Sails @ 7pm
Return: 1:00am

COST: $37.00 (includes admission, full buffet, live entertainment, $3.00 port tax)
There may be a $2.00 fuel surcharge added. WHAT A DEAL!
*****CHECK THE BOSTON GLOBE OR WEBSITE FOR COUPONS OFF*****

********* FREE Parking*********************************************

******Grand dinner buffet- no reserved seating. Check the
website for menu? All food is freshly made onboard the
ship.
******* Al La Carte Menu available throughout cruise, but it not included in admission price.

******* Proper Dress Required: Business Casual -Cocktail *********************
VAILID ID REQUIRED FOR ALL AGES

Horizon's Edge Cruises
75 Marine Blvd.(just off The Lynnway Rt1A)
Lynn Ma 01905

*NOTE: There are several meetup groups attending this event We will meetup at the ticket counter @ 5pm. We wait 10 minutes for anyone who may be late. Sorry, but we do not wait for "maybes."
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup @ 5pm at the ticket counter area. Look for the meetup sign
item.name: HORIZON'S EDGE Casino ,Dancing & Dinner Cruise
